game.shortDescription: ğŸ’¸ã€ŠPayGameã€‹is a black-and-white hand-drawn dungeon exploration game.You must race against time through randomly generated rooms, combining items and bills to pay massive amounts of money in order to stay alive.Each run offers a brand-new challenge and a completely different experience
